item.description: “Roll-up Stool å·å«å‡³” – An Upcycling Product. [ The design is a low stool that transforms an idle yoga mat to form a roll-adjustable cushion. The drop between the front and rear rotating shafts of the stool, enables the cushion to adapt to the dynamic process of the human body sitting through forming a certain distance of rolling , while providing more directional supportï¼Œwhich makes the interaction with the seat more interesting. ]
